paper_abstract: We investigate thermal properties of quantum correlations in the thermodynamic limit with reference to the XY-model and the finite two-qubit Heisenberg model. Although this model has been the subject of active entanglement-research, the bulk of the pertinent work refers to finite instantiations. As a consequence, the temperature cannot be properly de fined in such circumstances, a problem that is overcome here. Our effort should be of interest because quantum discord notion.
paper_title: DISCORD-ENTANGLEMENT INTERPLAY IN THE THERMODYNAMIC LIMIT: THE XY-MODEL
